encumbranceBarClient.name: Encumbrance Tracker
encumbranceBarClient.hint: Toggle whether to show the encumbrance tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet.

encumbranceBarWorld.name: Encumbrance Tracker (Global Override)
encumbranceBarWorld.hint: Toggle whether to show the encumbrance tracker in the equipment tab of the character sheet (Overrides client setting).

customSkills.label: Custom Skill
customSkills.desc: Allows you to add custom skills to the Cosmere RPG system.

customCurrency.label: Custom Currency
customCurrency.desc: Allows you to add custom currency to the Cosmere RPG system.

base.label: Base Unit
base.desc: Indicates this is used as the base unit for conversion rate.

image.label: Talent Image
image.desc: Opens the file browser to set an image.

append.label: Auto-Append
append.desc: Toggles auto-appending the substring ' (Talent Tree)' to the name of talents that lack it.
